content:
for the first time since  both the Penn State mens and womens cross country teams placed first at the Harry Groves Spiked Shoe Invitational PERIOD

With the women beginning the invitational at  a.m PERIOD at the BlueWhite Golf Course the Nittany Lions were able to employ its pack strategy to finish with four of its seven runners in the top ten PERIOD Freshman Elizabeth Chikotas placed second overall with a time of  PERIOD

Teammates Leigha Anderson Jillian Hunsberger  Tori Gerlach and Katie Rodden placed third fourth eighth and tenth respectively PERIOD

Sophomore Stephanie Aldrich placed thirteenth while senior Lauren Mills placed seventeenth PERIOD
